narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Washington Institute for Coagulation is a Pharmacy, Specialty Pharmacy provider based in Seattle, WA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $117.0M in Medicaid payments across 9K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $117.0M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 14,627 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
